hint: Apply predicate pushdown and convert implicit joins to explicit JOIN syntax, focusing on filtering date_dim and other dimensions early to reduce the fact table join size.
Isolate the highly selective date_dim filter into a CTE and pre-filter all dimension tables (item, customer, address, store) before joining with store_sales to reduce intermediate result size.
Materialize filtered subsets of all dimension tables AND the fact table in separate CTEs with aggressive pre‑filtering, then join only the necessary columns to minimize I/O and intermediate rows.
Transform the query by replacing some joins with EXISTS subqueries, especially for the customer–address–store relationship, and decompose the fact table scan to avoid redundant joins.
